name: DC Comics -- Guess Who I Am? Quiz | DC Comics | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Aquaman.

	Abandoned on coral at Mercy Reef as a baby, Aquaman was rescued by lighthouse keeper, Tom Curry. Later he became King of Poseidonis and a founding member of the Justice League of America.

Dr. Fate

	Nabu the Wise, one of the Lords of Order, gave Kent Nelson tremendous mystical power. When he put on the Helmet of Nabu, he became Dr. Fate.

Firestorm.

	Stein is a nuclear scientist from Pittsburg. Firestorm is now considered an elemental, being fire. He was also a member of the Justice League.

Ice.

	Tora is the daughter of Ola, King of the Ice-People, a Scandanavian tribe of magical ice-people. She has also been a member of the Justice League.

Cyborg.

	A member of the Tean Titans, Cyborg is part human and part machine.

Matter-Eater Lad.

	Kem is a member of the Legion of Super-Heroes from the 30th Century. He is able to eat matter of all forms.

Obsidian.

	Obsidian is a member of Infinity, Inc. His father is Alan Scott, the Golden Age Green Lantern, and the sister of Jennie-Lynn Hayden, also known as Jade.

Geo Force.

	Markov is the Prince of Markovia and charter member of The Outsiders.

Bronze Tiger.

	A martial arts expert and member of the Suicide Squad.

Animal Man.

	When Baker is near almost any any animal, he can temporarily absorb any of its abilities.
